website_summaries.verdict: A sleek folding treadmill with lots of features and a design that will fit your lifestyle and living space.
pros: Features a trim build that doesn't take up an extreme amount of space and is easy to fold for storage
Anti-skid surface absorbs shock as you walk or run
Has a built-in Bluetooth speaker for setting your workout to your favorite music
Compatible with an app to guide you in achieving your fitness goals
cons: Assembly instructions aren't very clear, but putting it together isn't too difficult

customer_reviews.title: Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill has a Bluetooth headset function, and the children can operate on their own, have fun and exercise, and are satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: It quit working after 30 days  ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome treadmill for the month that it lasted... the remote stopped working within two weeks. I figured, no big deal, since the machine has controls. Third week the power cord stopped working. It was loose to begin with, so I figured I would just buy a new one for $14.00. Worked for a week after that and the the machine stopped working all together and would only display an error message... I had to wrestle the damn thing back into the polystyrene and box to return it, but luckily UPS pickup was an option. So sad as I loved this treadmill!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this treadmill for small spaces.  Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill is perfect for my small space. Easy to use. The first one I ordered was unable to fold making my space more difficult to navigate. Jane at Rhythm and Fun was quick to respond. After prompt dialogue back and forth to explore options she offered to send a new treadmill. Well now I have my new treadmill set up. I did use Amazon to help with this and the tech was very good. It’s a great treadmill. It folds easily to store under bed, couch or in my case vertically at the side of my wall unit. Customer service was stellar!!
customer_reviews.author: etelka

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really to assemble. Heavy- but does have wheels at the front; can be moved by picking up the lighter end and rolling. Quiet- loudest sound seems to be footfall. Interface is easy to understand- started using it without using the instructions. This new treadmill is great. It doesn't have the option to change the elevation, but it also doesn't require you to lube the belt with this model. The control board is simple but effective for a treadmill desk setup. It is easy to move it around. Been using this for the last3 weeks now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness4Real 🍀

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Design and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got super lucky to buy this product on a lightning deal. This product is beautiful and easy to use to assemble. It's super quiet which is more amazing if you are doing exercise while watching a Netflix series or a movie. The only issue I have is starting the treadmill since its instruction is confusing at first. Overall, I absolutely love this product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Might be possessed by a poltergeist
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and you can move it around easily. But it’s not sturdy at all because it’s so light and isn’t made with enough heft. Also it might be possessed, it screams advertisements even when the switch is off. I have to unplug it to make the voices stop. See video. Will be returning or hiring a priest.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for Small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We really have gotten a lot of use out of this treadmill in the past few weeks. It is annoying where the on/off switch is located on the bottom front, but it is large enough to walk or jog on it, and we love that it shows the distance, speed, and calories burned. They should figure out a better way to ship it though because there were a few pieces of plastic in the bottom of the box which had broken off of the trim. The item is quite heavy for the cardboard and bit of styrofoam packaging.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nieman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a bit overpriced, however it serves its purpose well. During the quarantine time I need to keep my 69 year old mother healthy and that includes walking. She uses it daily. So far so good. I have tried light jogging on it too and experienced no issues. My one complaint is that in order to turn it on I need to use the remote control. Therefore if it is broken or lost the entire treadmill would be useless. There should be a start stop option on the machine itself and a second control remote as a backup. But over all I am happy with it. It came fully assembled which was very appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: aruju

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving
customer_reviews.text: I love this folding treadmill, it has wide tread belt ,smart remote control and workout App,high-quality,not noisy while running.it has Studsy handrail, balance myself much better,compact,safety.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality treadmill to help you keep fit in the comfort of your home
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality treadmill, very robust, and simple to use. You can stand it upright, or keep it under the bed when not in use. It is very quiet, so you can watch TV whilst you’re walking on it. Came with two remotes, very easy to operate and information screen on the treadmill indicates time used, steps, distance and calories. Also, includes speakers and bluetooth connection (apps for both ios and android.) There is no assembly required. Mine was damaged during transportation, one of the plastic covers on the right-side of the machine was cracked. But seller respond immediately and within days the proper parts were delivered and easily replaced. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great treadmill for small spaces. It easily folds up and unfolds easily. It works great and isn’t loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this treadmill, sturdy, beautiful, I walk at fast speed several times a week, no pain, soft walk, I don't run but wanted this one that can go faster in case I decide to start running. its in km. doesn't have incline, costumer support is great!.
customer_reviews.author: E. Zuluaga

customer_reviews.title: Product shocks me
customer_reviews.text: Works great solid designed. But it was delivered slightly damaged and it shocks me when I use it. Every time I touch the controls or the cross bar I get a shock. I’m in process of getting a replacement. Does anyone have the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: very compact !
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and very quiet for an apartment. bluetooth speaker is a little on the cheap side, but if you have great headphones who cares ! other than that it's s a great treadmill for a quick run .
customer_reviews.author: Diana Melendrez

customer_reviews.title: Great foldable treadmill with large running belt
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered in 2 days, which was just amazing. It is heavy, so you need help. But because it’s pre-assembled you just need to take it out from the box and it’s ready to use. I tried walking and it feels nice and it’s running smooth. I did a test one mile run and it felt sturdy and definitely big enough for me to run comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after 2 weeks. Keeps tripping
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 weeks. Keeps tripping. Very dangerous, can throw you off device without warning.
customer_reviews.author: Just fits

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill 50" Deck Length is worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Received the treadmill about 2 weeks ago and have used it everyday for at least an hour, mostly at a quick walking pace of 6.5 - 7.2 km/hr. I'm 6 foot, 200lbs and it feels extremely sturdy and performs well. I've done some jogging on it on days when there's been bad weather and it's fine for a jog but wouldn't want to do a full speed run on it. It's 100% no frills and more expensive than other models like it, but it's 100% worth it for the longer deck on it compared to other models. Being 6" a 42" or 44" deck wouldn't be long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact treadmill
customer_reviews.text: My dad got it for me I was worries it wouldn't fit in my living room but did,easy to move around and was in sale at the time she got it,I have no complains,nice, cheap and compact and small spot to put my cell phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite85

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill! For what it does, it's exactly what I was looking for! Simple control, and pretty sturdy. I needed a treadmill that I could just pull up in my room and watch TV and turn on a fan and just go for a run. I didn't need any bells and whistles, just something that would last and is space saving. I can just roll this underneath my bed, which is essential for me! It's set in km instead of miles, but that's alright!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Salanga

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, i like treditional treadmill with head bourd readings
customer_reviews.text: I fill this type treadmill is for the young generation ,because your. Smart phone is the key for operation!
customer_reviews.author: Rogerjackson

customer_reviews.title: Great but it broke after 9 months of use
customer_reviews.text: It is a great treadmill but unfortunately, it broke after 9 months of use... I am so disappointed. No need to invest in this treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Great product, safety, space saving, quiet and design, excellent after sale service
customer_reviews.text: Good design product, easy storage and operate. quiet and convenience to use on day or night at your home, especially during the raining and poor outdoor weather condition. Excellent after sale services, with skillful, professional technical team that always on your side, to help and provide the solution and advice to make sure the product is on a perfect condition, we highly recommend RHYTHM FUN treadmill to anyone that want to purchase a treadmill for family or personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Wyman Chong

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill!!! Compact but sturdy and smooth. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: Handrail was stuck! Won’t fold it down!
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much but handrail was stuck since few months now can’t fold it down! Super upset with this and can’t figure it out what I should do!! Is there any way to contact customer service for rhythm fun folding treadmill?
customer_reviews.author: TENZIN Marsen

customer_reviews.title: Nkothing to assemnle, i suck at that since reading instructions test my attention span.
customer_reviews.text: Comes assembled which was awesome. Very quiet, doesnt incline but we wanted wideer and longer running surface. Perfect for a pandemic winter.
customer_reviews.author: Craig T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill is perfect. It’s compact, easy to use, and works great. I was worried that the tread was going to be too small to run but it’s perfect and I’m 5’7. I don’t think the speed and distance is accurate but I use a fit watch anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was working right from the start
customer_reviews.text: Would not turn on. Had problems contacting company. Told how to fix via a video. Not happy. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Morano

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect but Great to have.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because self quarantine for Corona Virus... I didn't expect that much but it works great so far... I love Dial for speed up and down. I don't use App, but simple and neat!!! I highly recommend this one if you have to stay home for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: COVID-19 Home Office Mobility
customer_reviews.text: After months of sedentary work from home, I finally decided to upgrade to an option that introduces mobility. In combination with a sit/stand desktop converter, I am using the under desk treadmill to walk 5-9 miles per day while working. The unit is quiet allowing me to be on work calls while in motion.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Helton

customer_reviews.title: Love it buy it
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required, comes ready. Came earlier than expected. Beware that the pandemic is causing big items to come slowly tho. Bluetooth set up Is easy. It goes up to 12/mph the description is wrong. Also slides under my bed easily
customer_reviews.author: TaylorMarie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, sturdy does not take up a-lot of room either. Connects with your phone which is great a way to control speed.It has a lot of running space which is really good for taller people. Nice sleek design, it doesn’t look as bulky as the average treadmills but performs just as good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Mujeeb

customer_reviews.title: Error code:  EOC
customer_reviews.text: My equipment stop working and appear this error code. I didn't find any website to get informations and manual to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Marcio K.

customer_reviews.title: It is good
customer_reviews.text: I love this treadmill and there are no issues. If you need any issues, but not fundamental ones, which are price too bit expensive, phone holder it is very cheap and does not work bigger size phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kosuke Yanagitani

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy, great size, and I get a really good work out on it. It’s simple and perfect for at home use. It’s pretty quiet and all around a fantastic machine. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Single mom’s dream
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I am a single mom who needs an outlet to work out and hello this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected. Use it daily with no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roxanne Rader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing treadmill, didn't come damaged it was boxed perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing treadmill worth every dime! If your looking for a treadmill this one is it!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Good treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the treadmill, I like being able to store it and also use it without handrails-and I get a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this treadmill under my standing desk. I use it everyday. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Desperate parent

customer_reviews.title: I love this treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: It is very is to use and also it’s very sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: michael

product_meta.title: RHYTHM FUN Treadmill Folding Running Treadmill Under Desk Walking Pad Treadmill with Foldable Handtrail Wide Tread Belt Super Slim Mini Quiet Home Treadmill with Smart Remote Control and Workout App
feature_bullets: 🌼1. 2-in-1 Fitness models treadmill :---Walking & Running treadmill. Unlike normal treadmill, RHYTHM FUN treadmill can be used 2 ways.when treadmill handrail folded, it becomes to under desk treadmill or standing desk treadmill, you can walk while you work with the speed max to 3.7mph=6km/h. when handrail put up,you can running as normally with speed max to 7.5mph=12km/h.

🌼2. Folding, space-saving treadmill:---7“thickness,97lb light weight, only covering less 0.3㎡ small space in your room or office.Compact , foldable, and wheels on the treadmill make the treadmill easier to portable put away after use.Ideal for exercise fitness and home running in USA families.

🌼3. Shock absorption & noise reduction design:---Strong 2.0hp electric motorized DC power motor，silicon structure honeycomb running board ,7-level soft large running belt,durable steel frame make up the RHYTHM FUN treadmill's AIR shock reduction & noise reduction system.Less noise & safety make your running quiet & comfortable! No matter beginners or seniors!

🌼4. Bluetooth Speaker, Smart workout APP & Remote Controller----RHYTHM FUN treadmill can be connected phone with bluetooth, play music when running & walking , or watch TV by treadmill phone holder. Also,you can easily monitor and track your workout on smart workout APP & remote controller, setting all kinds favorite trainning program freely.

🌼5. 3 kinds Easy operate way,Needn't Assembly!---Except for Remote & APP control, you can manual control treadmill! One-home button control! Easy& Quick! [wide running belt ]: 50”x18”.[walking speed]: 0.6-3.7MPH [running speed] : 0.6-7.5MPH [meter function]: time, distance, calorie, speed. [standing size]: 61"x 30" x 43" [folding size]: 61"x 30" x8" [User Capacity:】: 220lb [Warranty]:Main Frame: 10 years; Parts: 1 year; Motor: 2 Years !
